title: Who loves Heidi?
content:
Can anyone ID the typefaces used in the title here?

Many thanks,  
Tim

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [255038.1010.A.jpg.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164623/http:/typophile.com/files/255038.1010.A.jpg.jpeg) | 13.58 KB |
author: belonax

comments.content:
I think it looks like a Caslon Swash, but the [Cabernet Swash](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164623/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0001003#characters) at Veer, which I thought was based on Caslon is not the same. To me the H looks like the lower part was customized.

Is the image recent, or before the mid-80's?

- Mike Yanega

Thanks Mike! I think it's pre-80s. I think you're right about the customization.  
Earlier titles for it were set in blackletter.
